metadata.synopsis: A waveservant in the Cellar area of Water Queen's House stops the player to warn about "dangers" that await them ahead
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to CellarWaveservant01 or get into spot trigger around hergoto -1787.596; 0.197; -98.252

0.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
0.text: Stop! You can't go back there.
0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed/angry; wants the player to leave this restricted area ASAP

1.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
1.text: Please go back upstairs - before we all get in trouble.

2.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
2.text: You shouldn't be down here. This place is off-limits to laypeople.
2.context: NodeContext: Annoyed; wants the player to leave this restricted area ASAP
